about.metaDescription: Learn why privacy matters in prediction markets and how Obsidian Market offers maximum privacy through zero-knowledge proofs on Aleo.
about.title: Privacy-First Prediction Markets
about.subtitle: In traditional prediction markets, your bets reveal your beliefs, your strategy, and your financial situation. Obsidian Market changes that.
about.whyPrivacyIntro: Prediction markets are powerful tools for aggregating information and forecasting outcomes. But without privacy, they expose participants to serious risks that undermine their effectiveness.
about.frontRunningDesc: When your trades are visible, others can see your bet before it settles and trade ahead of you, stealing your edge and moving prices against you.
about.retaliationDesc: Betting on controversial outcomes—political events, social issues, corporate decisions—can expose you to judgment, harassment, or worse if your positions are public.
about.financialPrivacyDesc: Your betting history reveals your net worth, risk tolerance, and financial sophistication. This information can be used against you in negotiations, by employers, or by bad actors.
about.priceDiscoveryDesc: When bets are private, prices reflect genuine beliefs rather than performative signaling. Privacy enables honest participation without social pressure.
about.howWeProtectIntro: Obsidian Market is built from the ground up for maximum privacy, leveraging cutting-edge cryptography on the Aleo blockchain.
about.zkProofsDesc: Built on Aleo, every bet uses zero-knowledge proofs. The network verifies your transaction is valid without ever learning the details of your bet.
about.privateBetsDesc: Your positions are stored as private records that only you can see. No one—not even the market operators—knows what you bet on or how much.
about.torSupportDesc: Connect via Tor to hide your IP address and prevent network-level surveillance. We provide an indicator so you always know your connection status.
about.noKycDesc: No account creation, no identity verification, no email. Just connect your wallet and start trading with complete pseudonymity.
about.ctaDescription: Your predictions are your business. Obsidian Market keeps them that way.
